overview_of_class: Acts of persuasion affect us in all aspects of our lives. This course will examine the different ways in which we observe and use persuasion in the communication we have with our families, our friends, and the general public. How effective are we? How are we affected by persuasion? This will culminate in an overall assessment of persuasion's effects on us as individuals and as a society.
name: Theories of Persuasion
subject: COMM_ST
